arts.ttl: Champions League — Newcastle vs. Athletic Bilbao – Match Preview
arts.sum: Newcastle United return to Champions League action on Wednesday against Athletic Bilbao at St James’ Park, seeking a third straight group-stage win after back-to-back clean-sheet victories over Union SG and Benfica. arts.ttl: Newcastle United vs Athletic Club – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Newcastle United return to European action on Wednesday, desperate to wash away the disappointment of their weekend league defeat. The Magpies host Athletic Club tonight in a crucial Champions League fixture at St. James’ Park. While their domestic form has been inconsistent, Eddie Howe’s side have been superb in this competition. arts.ttl: How Newcastle and Athletic Club forged a bond that has lasted over 30 years
arts.sum: In Palacio Ibaigane, the regal building in Bilbao that serves as Athletic Club's headquarters, where the contracts were once signed, there hangs a pennant. It is in an office where Howard Kendall once entertained dignitaries over a drink.
